long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Referer Spoofer is a simple, effective, and feature-rich Chrome extension designed for developers and advanced users who want complete control over the Referer header of their HTTP requests. With this extension, you can quickly set or remove a custom Referer header with just a click. Whether youâ€™re testing applications, verifying redirections, or simulating specific traffic sources, Referer Spoofer helps you navigate the web with unparalleled flexibility and ease.

Key Features:
- Easy Customization: Enter any Referer header of your choice through a clean and user-friendly interface.
- Instant Refresh: Automatically refreshes the page to immediately apply or remove the selected Referer header.
- Referer Removal: Reset to the default behavior with a single click, ensuring full control over your browsing experience.
- Dynamic Rules Management: Modify HTTP headers dynamically without disrupting your workflow, thanks to seamless rule updates.
- Error Feedback: Enhanced error handling ensures a smooth user experience, with clear feedback for invalid inputs or unexpected issues.
- Time-Saving for Developers: Perfect for testing behaviors related to referer-based traffic sources, redirections, and analytics testing.
- Integrated Resources: Quick access to Chrome documentation, HTTP header references, and our GitHub repository for more insights.

How to Use:
1) Click on the Referer Spoofer icon in the Chrome toolbar.
2) To set a custom Referer:
- Enter the desired URL in the input field.
- Click Set and Refresh to apply the Referer and reload the page.
3) To remove the custom Referer:
Simply click Delete Referer to reset it and refresh the page.

Why Use Referer Spoofer?
This extension is an indispensable tool for:
- Developers: Debug and test referer-based application behavior with ease.
- Testers: Simulate different traffic sources to verify application redirections and analytics.
- Advanced Users: Gain granular control over HTTP headers for specific use cases.

Note:

Use Referer Spoofer ethically and in full compliance with the terms of service of the websites you interact with. Misuse of the extension could violate policies or disrupt services.
